common.login_required: Login is required to use the following feature: {feature}.

infinite_challenge.intro_1: THIS WILL BE MY FIRST AND LAST WARNING TO THOSE WHO DARE TO CHALLENGE THE INFINITE.
infinite_challenge.intro_2: THIS CHALLENGE COSTS 10 COINVERSUS, AND FOR EACH CHALLENGER DEFEATED, THE REWARD WILL INCREASE PROPORTIONALLY.
infinite_challenge.intro_3: THE CURRENT POT IS {pot}. DO YOU WISH TO RISK THIS CHALLENGE?
infinite_challenge.insufficient_funds: Your CoinVersus balance is insufficient to enter the challenge.
infinite_challenge.validating_entry: Validating entry and preparing the challenge...
infinite_challenge.buff_selection_title: Victory! Choose a bonus for the next round:

buffs.resto_10_desc: Your next 'Rest' is guaranteed to be 10, regardless of the card you play.
buffs.discard_low_draw_value_desc: Discard your lowest value card and draw a new value card.
buffs.discard_effect_draw_effect_desc: Discard a random effect card and draw a new effect card.
buffs.draw_10_discard_one_desc: Draw a 10 value card and discard your lowest value card.
buffs.draw_reversus_total_desc: Draw a 'Reversus Total' card and discard a random effect card.
buffs.immunity_negative_desc: In this round, you are immune to 'Less' and 'Down' effects.
buffs.reveal_opponent_hand_desc: In this round, your opponent's hand will be visible to you.
buffs.immunity_defeat_desc: Immunity to defeat. If you lose this round, you will still advance to the next opponent.
buffs.auto_win_desc: Skip the next opponent and advance directly to the next bonus choice.
buffs.versatrix_card_desc: Draw 4 effect cards and 4 value cards immediately.
buffs.contravox_card_desc: The opponent discards 2 of their effect cards at random.
buffs.necroverso_card_desc: The opponent's highest value card is blocked for the next round.
buffs.rei_reversum_card_desc: Trade one of your effect cards for a 'Reversus Total' card.

shop.select_avatar_desc: Select an avatar to purchase. It will appear next to your name in rooms and on the leaderboard.
shop.confirm_purchase: Do you want to buy the '{avatarName}' avatar?
shop.login_required: Log in to access the shop.

quick_start.title: Quick Start
quick_start.description: Choose how you want to play.

matchmaking.title: PVP Matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Choose the mode to find a match.
matchmaking.cancel_success: You have left the matchmaking queue.

info.objective_text: Be the first player (or duo) to get your pawn to space 10 on the board.
info.turn_text: On your turn, you can play effect cards freely and must follow the rule below for value cards. Then, pass the turn.
info.value_card_rule_1: If you have 2 or more value cards in hand, you MUST play exactly one per turn.
info.value_card_rule_2: If you have only 1 value card, you CANNOT play it. It will be locked to be used as your "Rest".
info.value_card_rule_3: The played value card becomes your new "Rest" for the next round.
info.end_of_round_text: The round ends when all players pass their turn consecutively. The score is calculated, and pawns move.
info.end_of_round_rule_1: Winner(s): Advance 1 space. In case of a tie, no one advances.
info.end_of_round_rule_2: 'Up'/'Down' Effects: Move your pawn up or down.
info.end_of_round_rule_3: 'More'/'Less' Effects: Add or subtract the value of your "Rest" from your score.
info.special_card_pula: Jump: Forces an opponent to move their pawn to an empty path on the board.
info.special_card_reversus: Reversus: Reverses an effect ('More' becomes 'Less', 'Up' becomes 'Down', etc.) on a single player.
info.special_card_reversus_total: Reversus Total: The most powerful card. Reverses ALL effects on ALL players for the round (Global effect). Can also be used to apply and lock a basic effect ('More', 'Less', etc.) on a single target for one round (Individual effect).
info.field_effects_text: Landing on colored spaces on the board activates special effects that last for the entire round!
info.credits_line_1: The game "Reversus" was created by Xael in 2023 with the theme "Race to the Altar" as a Card Game + Board Game to raise funds for his wedding - and now we are on version 4.0 (09/25/2025) with many new features!
info.credits_line_2: Enjoy all the modes and features:
info.credits_line_4: My special thanks to everyone who supported this project from the beginning.
info.conduct_title: Code of Conduct and Reasons for Banning
info.conduct_intro: The user agrees not to engage in the following actions within the game, under penalty of suspension or permanent ban of the account:
info.conduct_item1_text: Use of profanity, insults, threats, harassment, or any type of discrimination (race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, etc.).
info.conduct_item2_text: Acts that cause discomfort to other players, including stalking, persistent messaging, or abusive behavior.
info.conduct_item3_text: Attempted fraud, embezzlement, money laundering, sharing of illegal information, or malicious links.
info.conduct_item4_text: Use of hacks, cheats, bots, macros, or any resource that provides an unfair advantage over other players.
info.conduct_item5_text: Massive sending of messages, advertisements, external links, or any type of unauthorized marketing in the game.
info.conduct_item6_text: Commercialization, lending, or sharing of the account with third parties without official authorization.
info.conduct_item7_title: Use of inappropriate language in chat and official channels:
info.conduct_item7_text: Including any sexually explicit content, gore, incitement to hatred, or violent speech.
info.privacy_intro: By using the game, the user declares to be aware of and in agreement with the following points:
info.privacy_item1_text1: The game may collect information such as email, nickname, chat message logs, and in-game interactions.
info.privacy_item1_text2: This data is used to ensure security, prevent fraud, enforce the code of conduct, and improve the user experience.
info.privacy_item2_title: Access to messages and internal communications
info.privacy_item2_text1: The game staff may access chats and internal emails when there is a report or suspicion of a rules violation, always respecting GDPR.
info.privacy_item2_text2: No communication will be shared with third parties without consent, except when required by law.
info.privacy_item3_text: The player can request the deletion of their personal data at any time, aware that this may result in the permanent closure of the account.
info.privacy_item4_text: By creating an account and continuing to use the game, the user fully agrees with these rules and privacy policies.

credits.title: Credits
credits.beta_testers_thanks: thank you so much for the feedback s2!
credits.special_thanks_1: My family, my eternal Gemini Versatrix Karol s2
credits.special_thanks_2: My friends and family who supported the creation of the Reversus game in some way
credits.special_thanks_3: To everyone who supported my wedding and bought the physical version of the board and card game!
credits.special_thanks_4: To my mother-in-law Vilma who financed the entire printing production to make the game a reality.

field_effect_descriptions.carta_menor: Discard your lowest value card and draw a new one.
field_effect_descriptions.imunidade: You are immune to negative effects ('Less', 'Down').
field_effect_descriptions.desafio: Win the round without 'More' or 'Up' to advance 3 spaces.
field_effect_descriptions.impulso: Even if you lose, advance 1 space.
field_effect_descriptions.troca_justa: Trade your lowest value card for an opponent's highest value card.
field_effect_descriptions.reversus_total: Activates the 'Reversus Total' effect for the entire round.
field_effect_descriptions.carta_maior: Discard your highest value card and draw a new one.
field_effect_descriptions.super_exposto: Negative effects ('Less', 'Down') are doubled on you.
field_effect_descriptions.castigo: If you lose the round, move back 3 spaces.
field_effect_descriptions.parada: If you win the round, do not advance.
field_effect_descriptions.troca_injusta: Trade your highest value card for a random opponent's lowest value card.

achievement_descriptions.first_win: Congratulations, you won your first match.
achievement_descriptions.first_defeat: Life is made of defeats... don't let it get to you, or the game is over.
achievement_descriptions.versatrix_loss: Did Versatrix really want to beat you?
achievement_descriptions.speed_run: Win a match in under 5 minutes.
achievement_descriptions.versatrix_win: You defeated Versatrix... Maybe she left something for you.
achievement_descriptions.versatrix_card_collected: You found and collected the special Versatrix card!
achievement_descriptions.reversum_win: He thought he was the most powerful, but there is another King now.
achievement_descriptions.tutorial_win: Learning and winning in the tutorial is for the few.
achievement_descriptions.xael_win: Defeated the game's creator in a special duel.
achievement_descriptions.quick_duel_win: Winning a quick match is also an achievement!
achievement_descriptions.true_end_beta: You defeated a king... but not the master behind the shadows.
achievement_descriptions.true_end_final: Congratulations, tell me how you managed to win later.
achievement_descriptions.inversus_win: You defeated the dark reflection of Reversus. The secret is in the game's logo.
achievement_descriptions.120%_unlocked: The secret of the secret, the password is "Final"
achievement_descriptions.infinite_challenge_win: Defeat every opponent in Infinite Challenge mode.

achievement_hints.first_win: The first step to glory is simply... to win.
achievement_hints.first_defeat: Sometimes, to learn how to win, you must first... lose.
achievement_hints.versatrix_loss: Is a loss to the golden queen truly a defeat?
achievement_hints.speed_run: Time is also an opponent. Be faster than it.
achievement_hints.contravox_win: .noitacifinalpxe na sah sihT .noitacifinalpxe na sah sihT
achievement_hints.versatrix_win: A victory against Versatrix may reveal more than just the path forward.
achievement_hints.versatrix_card_collected: The golden queen sometimes hides in plain sight, even before the game begins.
achievement_hints.reversum_win: Dethrone the tyrant to prove who really rules.
achievement_hints.tutorial_win: Even the first lesson can be a decisive victory.
achievement_hints.xael_win: They say the Creator only appears when the chaos is... Total.
achievement_hints.quick_duel_win: Prove your worth in a quick and direct match.
achievement_hints.true_end_beta: You defeated a king... but not the master behind the shadows.
achievement_hints.true_end_final: To face the final darkness, you will need an unexpected alliance.
achievement_hints.inversus_win: The dark reflection of Reversus awaits. The final victory reveals this path.
achievement_hints.120%_unlocked: When the narrator gets tired of telling the story, he enters it. A victory over the reflection opens this door.
achievement_hints.infinite_challenge_win: The journey is long, but glory is eternal. Defeat everyone in the Infinite Challenge.

ai_dialogue.necroverso_tutorial_winning_1: Você ainda tem muito a aprender...
ai_dialogue.contravox_winning_1: !arogA redreP riV oãN E redreP acnuN ue
ai_dialogue.versatrix_losing_1: Você sabe que eu posso reverter o campo, né?
ai_dialogue.versatrix_losing_2: Eu pensei... que você fosse diferente... será que me enganei?
ai_dialogue.reversum_winning_1: PENSEI QUE ISSO SERIA UM DESAFIO
ai_dialogue.narrador_winning_1: Eu estudei todos os seus movimentos...
ai_dialogue.narrador_winning_2: Já fiz todos os cálculos para te derrotar em menos de 10 jogadas.
ai_dialogue.xael_losing_1: Hmm, interessante... mas não será o suficiente.
ai_dialogue.detetive_winning_1: Os fatos são claros. Minha vitória é inevitável.
ai_dialogue.detetive_winning_2: Sua estratégia é transparente. Antecipei todos os seus movimentos.
ai_dialogue.detetive_losing_1: Interessante... uma anomalia nos dados. Devo reavaliar.
ai_dialogue.detetive_losing_2: Você é um oponente mais astuto do que as evidências sugeriam.

story_dialogue.start_necroverso_text: Olá estranho... seja bem-vindo! Você está no Inversus, e eu sou o Necroverso. Se deseja retornar ao seu mundo, deve desafiar os soberanos deste lugar...
story_dialogue.pre_tutorial_prompt_text: Sim, através de um duelo! Eles jogam um jogo de cartas e tabuleiro chamado REVERSUS. Gostaria que eu lhe ensinasse o básico em uma partida?
story_dialogue.tutorial_skip_text: Você deve ser um prodígio... Boa sorte, então. Enfrente o Contravox.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_1_text: Ótimo. A regra principal é: ter a maior pontuação no final da rodada para avançar no tabuleiro. Simples, certo?
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_2_text: Sua pontuação é a soma de duas cartas de VALOR que você joga. Se tiver 2 ou mais cartas de valor, você DEVE jogar uma. Se tiver apenas uma, ela é guardada para a próxima rodada, sua última carta jogada será seu "Resto".
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_3_text: As cartas de EFEITO podem mudar tudo! "Mais" e "Menos" usam o valor do seu "Resto" para aumentar ou diminuir sua pontuação. "Sobe", "Desce" e "Pula" movem seu peão.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_4_text: As cartas "Reversus" e "Reversus Total" são mais complexas e podem virar o jogo. Você aprenderá seu poder na prática.
story_dialogue.tutorial_explain_5_text: Chega de conversa. Vamos jogar. Não pense em vencer, apenas em aprender as regras.
story_dialogue.tutorial_loss_text: Parece que você ainda não está pronto. Lembre-se, o objetivo é aprender. Vamos tentar de novo.
story_dialogue.post_tutorial_text: E com isso, terminamos o tutorial... Espero que tenha entendido tudo. Seu primeiro desafio real te espera.
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_intro_text: Vou te contar dois segredos sobre o Contravox para te ajudar no seu duelo...
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_text: Já que sou legal, vou te contar... Contravox é o mais fraco dos três... e ele tem uma habilidade especial... cuidado!
story_dialogue.pre_contravox_hint_option_1: Isso era pra ser um segredo?
story_dialogue.post_contravox_victory_text: Incrível... você realmente derrotou o Contravox?... certo... então... agora só restam mais dois, a próxima é a Versatrix, mas cuidado... nem tudo é o que parece.
story_dialogue.pre_versatrix_intro_text: A Versatrix é uma Geminiana... e ela é... valiosa!
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_1: Sinto que já nos encontramos em outra vida...
story_dialogue.start_versatrix_dialogue_text_2: Não quero perder... mas se você me vencer... eu ainda vou te ajudar...
story_dialogue.versatrix_solteira_text: Bem... seu oportunista, vamos apenas duelar!
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_victory_option_1: Quando eu os derrotar... o que acontece?
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_defeat_text: Não se preocupe... eu vou te ajudar na hora certa
story_dialogue.post_versatrix_ask_return_text:
Você está cada vez mais perto de retornar ao seu mundo...
Derrote o Rei Reversum e eu lhe darei uma chance de voltar ao seu mundo
story_dialogue.pre_reversum_intro_text: Duas informações valiosas... ele é o mais poderoso e é imune ao vermelho!
story_dialogue.start_reversum_text: EU SOU O REX REVERSUM TOTEM! CURVE-SE DIANTE DO SEU REI!
story_dialogue.start_reversum_option_2: Eu só quero terminar o jogo...
story_dialogue.post_reversum_victory_text: Finalmente, com eles derrotados, o Inversus é meu.
story_dialogue.final_confrontation_1_text: Eu não menti, vou te dar uma chance de voltar... no entanto, se você me derrotar.
story_dialogue.necroverso_king_battle_intro_text: Hahaha! Graças a você, tenho controle total sobre os reis que você derrotou! E eles lutarão por mim! Mas, para ser justo, vou explicar as regras: neste combate, quem tiver a menor pontuação na rodada perde um coração. Perca todos... e você será eliminado para sempre!
story_dialogue.post_necroverso_king_victory_text: Você... me derrotou? Impossível! Por enquanto, você está livre. Mas saiba que este não é o fim. Eu voltarei...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_1_text: Espere! Antes de enfrentá-lo, saiba que ele não pode ser vencido apenas chegando ao centro do tabuleiro primeiro... e não deixe a escuridão dele te tocar...
story_dialogue.versatrix_warning_2_text: Eu vou te ajudar... juntos venceremos!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_text: Mais duas dicas para você... seu tempo acabou e não há escapatória!
story_dialogue.pre_final_battle_option_1: Isso não pareceu ser uma dica...
story_dialogue.xael_challenge_intro_text: Então você aceita meu desafio! As regras aqui são diferentes. O objetivo é alcançar o espaço 10 com MAIS estrelas do que eu. Colete-as no tabuleiro e use seus efeitos com sabedoria. Pronto?
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_3: Mesmo que você me derrote... o Inversus... nunca deixará de existir.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_4: E com o tempo... um novo Necroverso surgirá.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_5: Ele se foi... por enquanto. Você nos salvou. Obrigada.
story_dialogue.endgame_dialogue_6: Acho que é hora de você ir para casa, não é? Ou... se quiser, pode ficar... A escolha é sua.

event_abilities.january_new: Pode fazer um caminho vermelho surgir à sua frente no início de cada rodada (50% de chance).
event_abilities.february_new: Troca as cartas de 'Resto' com o oponente no início de cada rodada, se for favorável.
event_abilities.march_new: No início do seu turno, compra 2 cartas de valor e descarta 2, priorizando manter as de maior valor.
event_abilities.april_new: Uma vez por turno, pode ignorar um efeito negativo jogado contra ele.
event_abilities.may_new: Joga suas cartas de valor e efeito viradas para baixo, revelando-as apenas no final da rodada.
event_abilities.june_new: Pode reutilizar uma carta de efeito que foi usada nesta rodada, uma vez por rodada.
event_abilities.july_new: Tem uma chance (50%) de roubar uma carta aleatória da sua mão por rodada.
event_abilities.august_new: Pode trocar de lugar no tabuleiro com o oponente uma vez por partida.
event_abilities.september_new: Uma vez por rodada, pode espiar e trocar uma carta da sua mão com uma da dele.
event_abilities.october_new: Uma vez por rodada (50% de chance), pode forçar todos a descartarem a carta de maior valor de suas mãos.
event_abilities.november_new: Uma vez por rodada, pode 'congelar' uma carta de efeito de um oponente, impedindo que ela seja jogada nesta rodada.
event_abilities.december_new: No início de cada rodada, ele pode trocar de mãos com você (50% de chance).

event.title: Monthly Event
event.description: Defeat the event opponent 3 times to earn an exclusive reward. You can only try once per day!
event.status_wait: You have already attempted the challenge today. Come back tomorrow!
event.status_completed: Challenge complete! Play again whenever you want this month.
event.victory_progress_message: You won! Event progress: {wins}/3. Come back tomorrow to continue.
event.victory_completed_message: Challenge complete! You unlocked the title: "{rewardName}"!
event.defeat_message: You were defeated. Come back tomorrow for a new attempt.
